</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[pasteCommand()](./textarea.pastecommand.md)


</td><td>

Command to read from the system clipboard. Resolves to a PasteMsg on success or PasteErrorMsg on failure.


</td></tr>
